Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) 2: Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials – Instructor TrainingIcon / Small / CalendarCreated with Sketch.18 Jan 2025 - 31 Dec 2028Icon / Small / LocationCreated with Sketch.VOCATIONAL SHORT COURSE | Duration 24 hours | In person | NEXT INTAKE TBCCCNA 2 dives into key topics such as switching, routing, WLANs, and security concepts. It is ideal for people in the ITS industry looking to become instructors in CCNA2 Switching, Routing and Wireless Essentials.
